titleInfo.title: 'File 18/7 Marriage of Vallance Solemnised by Captain Howes when he was Acting as Political Agent'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at 1 on the front cover and terminates at 7 on the back cover. The numbers are written in pencil and appear in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. Foliation anomaly: ff. 5, 5A.

mods.abstract: The file relates to a question over the authority of the Acting Political Agent, Bahrain to act as Registrar of Marriages, in the light of the solemnisation of a marriage by Captain John Baron Howes in August 1940. The file includes correspondence between the Political Agent, Bahrain; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; and the Government of India.
